title: Implement Automated Reporting Dashboard
description: We should create an automated daily reporting dashboard that pulls key metrics from all our Google Ads accounts. This would save us 2-3 hours daily and provide real-time insights for quicker optimization decisions.

comments.content: Great idea! I'll look into Data Studio templates we can customize.

title: Weekly PPC Lunch & Learn Sessions
description: Propose hosting weekly 30-minute lunch sessions where team members share recent discoveries, case studies, or industry updates. This could help us stay current with platform changes and learn from each other's experiences.

comments.content: Love this! I have some case studies from our recent Performance Max tests I could share.

title: Dedicated Testing Budget Allocation
description: Suggest allocating 10% of each campaign budget specifically for testing new ad copy, landing pages, and bidding strategies. This structured approach would help us continuously optimize without impacting main campaign performance.

title: Cross-Team Collaboration with Creative
description: We should establish regular meetings with the creative team to align on ad copy, landing page design, and seasonal campaigns. Better collaboration could improve our conversion rates and creative consistency.

comments.content: I'm already talking to the creative director about this. Should have an update next week.

title: Industry Conference Attendance Program
description: Propose creating a rotational program where team members can attend major PPC conferences (SMX, PPC Hero, etc.) and share learnings with the team. This would keep us ahead of industry trends.

comments.content: Update: Budget approved! Sarah will attend SMX East next month.
